Html: This might have already been said, I tried searching for it and didn't see anything, but for the talents on Moonfury  it's still listed as 5 talent points needed; it was changed to a 3 point talent with the spell dmg increase 3%,6%,10% to Moonfire, Wrath, and Starfire.  If this has already been caught then just ignore me lol.  Thanks =D

The Moonkin module already treats it as a three-point talent, and will show it as such when you load from Armory.  If you want to put five points in it be my guest, but good luck getting those results on live.
Never said I wanted to, just thought it was an error. :) Guess that's what I get for trying to be helpful.

Sorry, I wasn't trying to be a jerk.  You're right in that it doesn't display correctly, but it is handled internally as a 3-point talent.  The math is correct, but the visual is somewhat annoying.  My apologies.
Just manually change the max points attribute for it in ClassTalents until it's fixed on Blizzard side.
